nodes.bodyText: This now becomes possibly nullable, where it was not before. Was that intended?
Can we call this gzipToRawBytes, or inflateGzip or somesuch?
Also, using a ByteArrayOutputStream would allow you to not have to pass in the number of bytes of the uncompressed output.
Is there value in using the same gzip function in both classes, so as to be assured that they, in fact, work the same way?
Talked about this offline. Decided it's fine.
